title: Demi Moore on Writing Her Highly Personal New Book
text:
Demi Moore has eight well-behaved dogs, most of them rescues, all lap-size, none excessively yappy. At feeding time, each waits patiently as its silver dog bowl is filled from a tub of what one of Moore’s assistants explains is “human-grade” chow flown in from out of state. It’s good to run in a movie star’s pack.

The leader, or at least the seeming favorite, is Merple, who is gray with long, lank hair. She is a fixture in Moore’s lap during a recent interview on a sunny, late-summer morning at the actress’s home in the...
description: Cover story: In Demi Moore’s new memoir, Inside Out, nothing is off limits. From her transient childhood to her high-profile marriages to her addiction issues, the actress tells all—and explains what it was like to share it with her daughters
